about_the_game:
GOLD SKIN by Royal Bengal Armory

Step into luxury and style with the Gold Skin by Royal Bengal Armory. This distinguished gunsmith company is renowned for its mastery in crafting custom weapons. Specializing in exquisite works of firearm artistry, Royal Bengal Armory takes pride in exclusively utilizing premium materials. The Gold Skin, plated meticulously with Black and Gold, adds a touch of elegance and brings forth a regal aura to your weaponry. Each piece showcases a triangular crafted pattern, carefully created using cutting-edge CnC precision. With this premium cosmetic DLC, give your arsenal a luxurious and sophisticated feel and make your weapon truly your own.

This skin can be applied to all available weapons in the game. To give you a better idea of how it will appear on your preferred weapons, you can preview these aesthetics within the in-game weapon customization menu.

All skin brands are a fictional part of Zero Hour and does not represent any real or existing entities. Any resemblance to actual brands is purely coincidental. The purpose of using fictional brand names is solely for creative and illustrative purposes.
